arts.ttl: Union Berlin climbs away from Bundesliga relegation zone with 2-1 win in Freiburg
arts.sum: Freiburg remained three points behind fourth-placed Mainz ahead of Mainz’ game later at Borussia Dortmund. Lucas Höler broke the deadlock in the 29th minute when Vincenzo Grifo got behind the Union defense to cross for the Freiburg forward.

arts.ttl: Bundesliga Player Ratings | Freiburg’s Champions League Hopes Burned by Union Berlin Comeback
arts.sum: Union Berlin moved ten points clear of the automatic Bundesliga relegation places and dented SC Freiburg’s Champions League hopes with an impressive 2-1 away win. Freiburg took the lead in…

arts.ttl: Union Berlin inflict rare home loss on Freiburg
arts.sum: Andrej Ilić got a goal and an assist as Union Berlin came from behind to claim a vital victory in their survival hopes away at Freiburg, whose seven-game unbeaten streak came to an end. Andrej Ilić rose high to head home Union Berlin's winning goal past Noah Atubolu.

arts.ttl: Union stun Freiburg to reach 30 points
arts.sum: Union Berlin’s superb form continues with a come-from-behind 2-1 win in Freiburg.

arts.ttl: Freiburg vs. Union Berlin preview: Freiburg's European credentials put to the test
arts.sum: Freiburg will look to strengthen their Champions League ambitions with a win against Union Berlin at Europa-Park Stadion on Sunday.
